,POINT ,REPORT_YN ,QUIT_YN FROM MEMBER where ID = #{memberId} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT CLC.TITLE , TO_CHAR(CLC.ENROLL_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE , CA.NAME CATEGORY , CLC.NO CLASS_COMM_NO FROM CLASS_COMM CLC JOIN COMM_CATE CA ON CLC.CATE_NO = CA.NO WHERE WRITER = ${memberNo} ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT R.SCORE SCORE , R.CONTENT CONTENT , TO_CHAR(R.ENROLL_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI' ) ENROLL_DATE , R.CLASS_NO CLASS_NO , C.CLASS_NAME CLASS_NAME FROM REVIEW_LEC R JOIN CLASS C ON R.CLASS_NO = C.NO WHERE WRITER = ${mNo} ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT T.STATUS_YN FROM TEACHER T JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = T.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.NO = ${memberNo}
